titles: A breviate of the establishment of the Friendly Society for securing houses from loss by fire by mutual contribution agreed by the trustees inrolled in Chancery, and to be seen at large at the office.
author: Friendly Society (London, England)
notes: Prospectus for formation of a fire insurance company.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Insurance, Fire --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
